output_source_priority.description: Set output source priority, requires parameter 'source': 00 for utility first, 01 for solar first, 02 for SBU priority

description: Set device charger priority, requires parameter 'source'
For HS: 00 for utility first, 01 for solar first, 02 for solar and utility, 03 for only solar charging
For MS: 00 for utility first, 01 for solar first, 03 for only solar charging

bulk_charging.description: Set battery bulk (constant voltage) charging voltage, requires parameter 'voltage' 48.0V ~ 58.4V for 48V unit, it cannot be set lower than float voltage

float_charging.description: Set battery float charging voltage, requires parameter 'voltage' 48.0V ~ 58.4V for 48V unit

utility_max_charging.description: Set utility max charging current, requires parameter 'current'

max_charging.description: Set max charging current, requires parameter 'current'

back_to_grid.description: Set battery recharge voltage (back to grid), requires parameter 'voltage', check your model's manual for allowed values

back_to_battery.description: Set battery re-discharge voltage (back to battery), requires parameter 'voltage', check your model's manual for allowed values
